thread.title: In NYC, an army of 65,000 4-year-olds heads to free, full-day preschool
thread.title_full: In NYC, an army of 65,000 4-year-olds heads to free, full-day preschool

title: In NYC, an army of 65,000 4-year-olds heads to free, full-day preschool
text:
09 In NYC, an army of 65,000 4-year-olds heads to free, full-day preschool 
The Washington Post: When the new school year opens Wednesday in New York City, 65,000 4-year-olds will attend free pre-kindergarten â€” the largest expansion of public school of its kind in the country.The pre-kindergarten rolls, larger than the entire K-12 public school enrollment of Boston or Seattle, makes good on a campaign promise by Mayor Bill de Blasio (D) to offer full-day preschool to every 4-year-old in the city.
